publication.abstract: Genes interact with each other in complex networks that enable the processing of information and the metabolism of nutrients inside the cell. A novel inference algorithm based on linear ordinary differential equations is proposed. The algorithm can infer the local network of gene-gene interactions surrounding a gene of interest from time-series gene expression profiles. The performance of the algorithm has been tested on in silico simulated gene expression data and on a nine gene subnetwork part of the DNA-damage response pathway (SOS pathway) in the bacteria Escherichia coli. This approach can infer regulatory interactions even when only a small number of measurements is available. Â© The Institution of Engineering and Technology.
